mapper.select: select avb_amnt from tb_acc where user_code = #{userCode}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_acc ( user_code, acc_no, avb_amnt, froze_amnt, total_amnt, last_caldate, syscode, create_time, modify_time, operator) values( #{userCode}, #{accNo}, #{avbAmnt}, #{frozeAmnt}, #{totalAmnt}, #{lastCaldate}, #{syscode}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{operator} )

insert into tb_acc( user_code, acc_no, avb_amnt, froze_amnt, total_amnt, last_caldate, syscode, create_time, modify_time, operator, version_id ) select c.user_code, '01', case when b.freeze_flag ='0' then 0 when b.freeze_flag ='1' then c.amnt else c.amnt end avb_amnt, case when b.freeze_flag ='0' then c.amnt when b.freeze_flag ='1' then 0 else 0 end froze_amnt, c.amnt, now(), #{syscode}, now(), now(), #{operator}, #{versionId} from tb_user_detail b ,tb_acc_detail c where 1=1 and b.user_code = c.user_code and c.cntflag ='0' and c.rela_usercode= #{relaUsercode} and c.syscode = #{syscode} and not EXISTS( select 1 from tb_acc d where d.user_code =c.user_code ) ;
mapper.update:
update tb_acc a,tb_acc_detail b,tb_user_detail d set a.avb_amnt =a.avb_amnt + ( case when d.freeze_flag ='0' then 0 else b.amnt end ), a.froze_amnt= a.froze_amnt + (case when d.freeze_flag ='0' then b.amnt else 0 end ), a.total_amnt = a.total_amnt+b.amnt, a.last_caldate = now(), a.modify_time = now(), b.cntflag ='1' where a.user_code = b.user_code and a.user_code = d.user_code
and b.cntflag='0' and b.syscode =#{syscode} and b.rela_usercode =#{relaUsercode}

update tb_acc a,tb_unfreeze_detail b,tb_user c
a.avb_amnt = a.avb_amnt +b.unfreeze_num, a.froze_amnt = a.froze_amnt - b.unfreeze_num, a.last_caldate = now(), a.modify_time = now(),
operator = #{operator}
where a.user_code =b.user_code and a.syscode = b.syscode and a.user_code = c.user_code and c.user_type =#{userType} and b.syscode = #{syscode} and b.status ='0'

UPDATE tb_acc t,tb_user_detail a SET t.froze_amnt = t.froze_amnt - (t.froze_amnt * #{ratio}), t.avb_amnt = t.avb_amnt + (t.froze_amnt * #{ratio}) where t.user_code = a.user_code and a.freeze_flag = '0' and a.user_type = '1' and t.froze_amnt >0
UPDATE tb_acc t SET t.total_amnt = t.total_amnt + #{amount}, t.avb_amnt = t.avb_amnt + #{amount}, t.froze_amnt_out = 0 where t.user_code = #{userCode}
